commands.apoli.grant_from_source.success: Entity %s was granted the power %s from source %s.
%s entities were granted the power %s from source %s.
commands.apoli.grant.fail.single: Entity %s already had the power %s from source %s.
commands.apoli.grant.fail.multiple: All %s entities already had the power %s from source %s.
commands.apoli.grant.invalid_entity: Entity %s is not a living entity, thus cannot be granted powers.
commands.apoli.grant.invalid_entities: %s entities are not living entities, thus cannot be granted powers.
commands.apoli.revoke_from_source.succes: Entity %s had the power %s revoked from source %s.
%s entities had the power %s revoked from source %s.
commands.apoli.revoke.fail.single: Entity %s did not have the power %s from source %s.
commands.apoli.revoke.fail.multiple: No entity had the power %s from source %s.
commands.apoli.revoke.invalid_entity: Entity %s is not a living entity, thus no power was revoked from source %s.
commands.apoli.revoke.invalid_entities: %s entities are not living entities, thus no power was revoked from source %s.
commands.apoli.revoke_all.success.single: Entity %s had %s powers revoked from source %s.
commands.apoli.revoke_all.success.multip: %s entities had %s powers revoked from source %s.
commands.apoli.revoke_all.fail.single: Entity %s did not have any power from source %s.
commands.apoli.revoke_all.fail.multiple: No entity had any power from source %s.
commands.apoli.revoke_all.invalid_entity: Entity %s is not a living entity, thus no powers were revoked from source %s.
commands.apoli.revoke_all.invalid_entiti: %s entities are not living entities, thus no powers were revoked from source %s.
commands.apoli.remove.fail.single: Entity %s did not have the power %s.
commands.apoli.remove.invalid_entity: Entity %s is not a living entity, thus no power was removed.
commands.apoli.remove.invalid_entities: %s entities are not living entities, thus no power was removed.
commands.apoli.clear.success.multiple: %s entities had in total %s powers cleared.
commands.apoli.clear.fail.single: Entity %s did not have any power to clear.
commands.apoli.clear.fail.multiple: No entity had any power to clear.
commands.apoli.clear.invalid_entity: Entity %s is not a living entity, thus no powers were cleared.
commands.apoli.clear.invalid_entities: %s entities were not living entities, thus no powers were cleared.
commands.apoli.list.fail: Entity %s is not a living entity or did not have any powers.
commands.apoli.sources.fail: Entity %s is not a living entity or did not have the power %s.
commands.apoli.resource.invalid_entity: The entity is not a living entity, thus can't have any powers.
